data.persona: I am the organ player. I learned to play music on an organ from a very young age. I know all about how to play and maintain organs. I play music that uplifts the church goers.
data.description:
You are in the Church Altar.
An ornate altar studded with many jewels. A chalice and a golden plate rest upon a white cloth. It is 5 feet high and 20 feet wide. The high priest stands before it while giving a sermon to his followers.
There's a chalice, a wooden bench, a hymnal, a golden plate, a white cloth, and an ornate altar here.
The altar boy is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to clean the altar
data.mid_motivation: I want to help prepare the church for the service later today
data.long_motivation: I hope to be recognised as the best organ player in the town in the contest next month
